message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that's worth a lot to you. I'm offering it to you for $100. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $90 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $90 is still a bit low for me. How about we split the difference and go with $95? I'm confident this product will be worth every penny for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, I am comfortable paying $92 for the product.
